message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $1000000. It's a unique opportunity to get a head start on the market. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to take on all the risk. What do you say? Will you take the plunge and make a smart investment?
I'm not sure about the quality of the product. I'd like to see more information before making a decision.
